ncmhdmDs3PortEntry.name: ncmhdmDs3PortEntry
ncmhdmDs3PortEntry.description: An entry in the dsu information table.

ncmhdmDs3PortNIDIndex.name: ncmhdmDs3PortNIDIndex
ncmhdmDs3PortNIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmDs3PortIndex.name: ncmhdmDs3PortIndex
ncmhdmDs3PortIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS1 interface to which this entry is applica- ble. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value as a dsx1LineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmDs3LBOSelection.name: ncmhdmDs3LBOSelection
ncmhdmDs3LBOSelection.description: Select the length of DS3 cable to be Normal (0-255 feet) or Long cable (225-450 feet).

ncmhdmDs3EquipCode.name: ncmhdmDs3EquipCode
ncmhdmDs3EquipCode.description: This is the Far End Equipment Identification code that describes the specific piece of equipment. It is sent within the Path Identification Message.

ncmhdmDs3LocationIDCode.name: ncmhdmDs3LocationIDCode
ncmhdmDs3LocationIDCode.description: This is the Far End Location Identification code that describes the specific location of the equipment. It is sent within the Path Identification Message.

ncmhdmDs3FrameIDCode.name: ncmhdmDs3FrameIDCode
ncmhdmDs3FrameIDCode.description: This is the Far End Frame Identification code that identifies where the equipment is located within a building at a given location. It is sent within the Path Identification Message.

ncmhdmDs3UnitCode.name: ncmhdmDs3UnitCode
ncmhdmDs3UnitCode.description: This is the Far End code that identifies the equipment location within a bay. It is sent within the Path Identification Message.

ncmhdmDs3FacilityIDCode.name: ncmhdmDs3FacilityIDCode
ncmhdmDs3FacilityIDCode.description: This code identifies a specific Far End DS3 path. It is sent within the Path Identification Message.

ncmhdmHssi1PortEntry.name: ncmhdmHssi1PortEntry
ncmhdmHssi1PortEntry.description: An entry in the dsu information table.

ncmhdmDs3Hssi1NIDIndex.name: ncmhdmDs3Hssi1NIDIndex
ncmhdmDs3Hssi1NIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmHssi1PortIndex.name: ncmhdmHssi1PortIndex
ncmhdmHssi1PortIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS1 interface to which this entry is applica- ble. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value as a dsx1LineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmHssi1ConfigMode.name: ncmhdmHssi1ConfigMode
ncmhdmHssi1ConfigMode.description: Set the Hssi Port to be automatic configuration or manual configuration.

ncmhdmHssi1PortConfig.name: ncmhdmHssi1PortConfig
ncmhdmHssi1PortConfig.description: Configure System - In-Service or Out of Service.

ncmhdmHssi1TestMode.name: ncmhdmHssi1TestMode
ncmhdmHssi1TestMode.description: Report status of the test mode of HSSI port.

ncmhdmHssi1DataRateMode.name: ncmhdmHssi1DataRateMode
ncmhdmHssi1DataRateMode.description: Data Rate Mode for the Hssi Ports .

ncmhdmHssi1CircuitID.name: ncmhdmHssi1CircuitID
ncmhdmHssi1CircuitID.description: This is the Circuit ID for the Hssi port.

ncmhdmHssiStatEntry.name: ncmhdmHssiStatEntry
ncmhdmHssiStatEntry.description: An entry in the Hssi ds3 stats table.

ncmhdmHssiStatNIDIndex.name: ncmhdmHssiStatNIDIndex
ncmhdmHssiStatNIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmHssiStatIndex.name: ncmhdmHssiStatIndex
ncmhdmHssiStatIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS1 interface to which this entry is applica- ble. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value as a dsx1LineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmStatPortState.name: ncmhdmStatPortState
ncmhdmStatPortState.description: Hssi Port - In-Service or Out of Service.

ncmhdmCurrentEntry.name: ncmhdmCurrentEntry
ncmhdmCurrentEntry.description: An entry in the DS3/E3 Current table.

ncmhdmCurrentNIDIndex.name: ncmhdmCurrentNIDIndex
ncmhdmCurrentNIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmCurrentIndex.name: ncmhdmCurrentIndex
ncmhdmCurrentIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS3/E3 interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value an ncmhdmLineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmCurrentSecsElaps.name: ncmhdmCurrentSecsElaps
ncmhdmCurrentSecsElaps.description: Seconds elapsed in the current interval.

ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCCV.name: ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCCV
ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCCV.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Code Violations, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCES.name: ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCES
ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCES.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCSES.name: ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCSES
ncmhdmCurrentFarEndCSES.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Severely Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentFarEndLUAS.name: ncmhdmCurrentFarEndLUAS
ncmhdmCurrentFarEndLUAS.description: Far End Line Unavailable Seconds. The counter associated with the number of Seconds the Far End DS3 interface was Out Of Service in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentLCV.name: ncmhdmCurrentLCV
ncmhdmCurrentLCV.description: The counter associated with the number of Line Code Violations, a bipolar or excesive zero violation, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentLES.name: ncmhdmCurrentLES
ncmhdmCurrentLES.description: Line Errored Second Total. The counter associated with the number of Seconds of in which one or more LCV occurred in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentLSESs.name: ncmhdmCurrentLSESs
ncmhdmCurrentLSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Line Severely Errored Seconds (LSES) in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentPCV.name: ncmhdmCurrentPCV
ncmhdmCurrentPCV.description: The counter associated with the number of Parity Code Violations (locally calculated P-bits disagree with those received), in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentPES.name: ncmhdmCurrentPES
ncmhdmCurrentPES.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds having at least one Parity Code Violation, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentPSES.name: ncmhdmCurrentPSES
ncmhdmCurrentPSES.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds having 44 or more Parity Code Violations, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentCCV.name: ncmhdmCurrentCCV
ncmhdmCurrentCCV.description: The counter associated with the number of C-bit Code Violations, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentCES.name: ncmhdmCurrentCES
ncmhdmCurrentCES.description: The counter associated with the number of C-bit Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentCSES.name: ncmhdmCurrentCSES
ncmhdmCurrentCSES.description: The counter associated with the number of C-bit Severely Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentSEFS.name: ncmhdmCurrentSEFS
ncmhdmCurrentSEFS.description: The counter associated with the number of seconds in which one or more Out of Frame occurred in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentAISS.name: ncmhdmCurrentAISS
ncmhdmCurrentAISS.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds in which one or more incoming AIS was detected in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentOOSSs.name: ncmhdmCurrentOOSSs
ncmhdmCurrentOOSSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds the DS3 interface was Out Of Service in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentLOSSs.name: ncmhdmCurrentLOSSs
ncmhdmCurrentLOSSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds Of system Loss Of Signal (LOS) in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmCurrentLOFSs.name: ncmhdmCurrentLOFSs
ncmhdmCurrentLOFSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds Of system Loss Of Frame (LOF) in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalEntry.name: ncmhdmIntervalEntry
ncmhdmIntervalEntry.description: An entry in the DS3/E3 Interval table.

ncmhdmIntervalNIDIndex.name: ncmhdmIntervalNIDIndex
ncmhdmIntervalNIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmIntervalIndex.name: ncmhdmIntervalIndex
ncmhdmIntervalIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS3/E3 interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value an ncmhdmLineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmIntervalNumber.name: ncmhdmIntervalNumber
ncmhdmIntervalNumber.description: A number between 1 and 96, where 1 is the most recently completed 15 minute interval and 96 is the least recently completed 15 minutes inter- val (assuming that all 96 intervals are valid).

ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCCV.name: ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCCV
ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCCV.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Code Violations, in the previous 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCES.name: ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCES
ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCES.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCSES.name: ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCSES
ncmhdmIntervalFarEndCSES.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Severely Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalFarEndLUAS.name: ncmhdmIntervalFarEndLUAS
ncmhdmIntervalFarEndLUAS.description: Far End Line Unavailable Seconds. The counter associated with the number of Seconds the Far End DS3 interface was Out Of Service in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalLCV.name: ncmhdmIntervalLCV
ncmhdmIntervalLCV.description: The counter associated with the number of Line Code Violations, a bipolar or excesive zero violation, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalLES.name: ncmhdmIntervalLES
ncmhdmIntervalLES.description: Line Errored Second Total. The counter associated with the number of Seconds of in which one or more LCV occurred in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalLSESs.name: ncmhdmIntervalLSESs
ncmhdmIntervalLSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Line Severely Errored Seconds (LSES) in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalPCV.name: ncmhdmIntervalPCV
ncmhdmIntervalPCV.description: The counter associated with the number of Parity Code Violations (locally calculated P-bits disagree with those received), in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalPES.name: ncmhdmIntervalPES
ncmhdmIntervalPES.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds having at least one Parity Code Violation, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalPSES.name: ncmhdmIntervalPSES
ncmhdmIntervalPSES.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds having 44 or more Parity Code Violations, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalCCV.name: ncmhdmIntervalCCV
ncmhdmIntervalCCV.description: The counter associated with the number of C-bit Code Violations, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalCES.name: ncmhdmIntervalCES
ncmhdmIntervalCES.description: The counter associated with the number of C-bit Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalCSES.name: ncmhdmIntervalCSES
ncmhdmIntervalCSES.description: The counter associated with the number of C-bit Severely Errored Seconds, in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalSEFS.name: ncmhdmIntervalSEFS
ncmhdmIntervalSEFS.description: The counter associated with the number of seconds in which one or more Out of Frame occurred in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalAISS.name: ncmhdmIntervalAISS
ncmhdmIntervalAISS.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds in which one or more incoming AIS was detected in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalOOSSs.name: ncmhdmIntervalOOSSs
ncmhdmIntervalOOSSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds the DS3 interface was Out Of Service in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalLOSSs.name: ncmhdmIntervalLOSSs
ncmhdmIntervalLOSSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds Of system Loss Of Signal (LOS) in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmIntervalLOFSs.name: ncmhdmIntervalLOFSs
ncmhdmIntervalLOFSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds Of system Loss Of Frame (LOF) in the current 15 minute interval.

ncmhdmTotalEntry.name: ncmhdmTotalEntry
ncmhdmTotalEntry.description: An entry in the DS3/E3 Total table.

ncmhdmTotalNIDIndex.name: ncmhdmTotalNIDIndex
ncmhdmTotalNIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmTotalIndex.name: ncmhdmTotalIndex
ncmhdmTotalIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS3/E3 interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value an ncmhdmLineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmTotalFarEndCCV.name: ncmhdmTotalFarEndCCV
ncmhdmTotalFarEndCCV.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Code Violations, in the last 24 hour interval.

ncmhdmTotalFarEndCES.name: ncmhdmTotalFarEndCES
ncmhdmTotalFarEndCES.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Errored Seconds, in the last 24 hour interval.

ncmhdmTotalFarEndCSES.name: ncmhdmTotalFarEndCSES
ncmhdmTotalFarEndCSES.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End C-bit Severely Errored Seconds, in the last 24 hour interval.

ncmhdmTotalLCV.name: ncmhdmTotalLCV

ncmhdmTotalLES.name: ncmhdmTotalLES
ncmhdmTotalLES.description: Line Errored Second Total. The counter associated with the number of Seconds of in which one or more LCV occurred in the last 24 hour interval.

ncmhdmTotalLSESs.name: ncmhdmTotalLSESs

ncmhdmTotalPCV.name: ncmhdmTotalPCV

ncmhdmTotalPES.name: ncmhdmTotalPES
ncmhdmTotalPES.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds having at least one Parity Code Violation, in the last 24 hour interval.

ncmhdmTotalPSES.name: ncmhdmTotalPSES
ncmhdmTotalPSES.description: The counter associated with the number of Seconds having 44 or more Parity Code Violations, in the last 24 hour interval.

ncmhdmTotalCCV.name: ncmhdmTotalCCV

ncmhdmTotalCES.name: ncmhdmTotalCES

ncmhdmTotalAISS.name: ncmhdmTotalAISS

ncmDs3PerformanceSnapShotEntry.name: ncmDs3PerformanceSnapShotEntry
ncmDs3PerformanceSnapShotEntry.description: An entry in the Ds3 Performance Snap Shot Entry table.

ncmDs3SnapShotNIDIndex.name: ncmDs3SnapShotNIDIndex
ncmDs3SnapShotNIDIndex.description: The object specifies the node id index of the node.

ncmDs3SnapShotIndex.name: ncmDs3SnapShotIndex
ncmDs3SnapShotIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the DS1 interface to which this entry is applica- ble. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value as a LineIndex object instance.

ncmDs3SnapShot.name: ncmDs3SnapShot
ncmDs3SnapShot.description: The variable specifies the option to initiate snap shot command.

ncmDs3TimeStampSec.name: ncmDs3TimeStampSec
ncmDs3TimeStampSec.description: The variable specifies the Time Stamp in Seconds .

ncmDs3TimeStampMilliSec.name: ncmDs3TimeStampMilliSec
ncmDs3TimeStampMilliSec.description: The variable specifies the Time Stamp in milli Seconds .

ncmDs3SnapShotSecs.name: ncmDs3SnapShotSecs
ncmDs3SnapShotSecs.description: The variable specifies number of seconds in the current interval.

ncmhdmTCAQtrTable.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrTable
ncmhdmTCAQtrTable.description: The quarter hour Alert Threshold Table.

ncmhdmTCAQtrEntry.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrEntry
ncmhdmTCAQtrEntry.description: An entry in the DS3/E3 table.

ncmhdmTCAQtrNIDIndex.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrNIDIndex
ncmhdmTCAQtrNIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmTCAQtrIndex.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrIndex
ncmhdmTCAQtrIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the alert crossing threshold interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value an plcpLineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCCV.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCCV
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCCV.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Far End C-bit Code Violation in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCES.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCES
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 Far End C-bit Errored Seconds, in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCSES.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCSES
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndCSES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 Far End C-bit Severely Errored Seconds, in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndLUAS.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndLUAS
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3FarEndLUAS.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Far End Line Unavailable Seconds in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LCV.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LCV
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LCV.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Line code Violation in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LES.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LES
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Line Errored Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LSESs.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LSESs
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LSESs.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Line Severely Errored Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PCV.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PCV
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PCV.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Parity Code Violation in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PES.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PES
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Parity Errored Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PSES.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PSES
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3PSES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Parity Severely Errored Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CCV.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CCV
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CCV.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer C-bit Code Violation in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CES.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CES
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 Far End C-bit Errored Seconds, layer Errored Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CSES.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CSES
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3CSES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer C-bit Severely Errored Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3SEFS.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3SEFS
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3SEFS.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Severely Errored Framing Seconds in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3AISS.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3AISS
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3AISS.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Alarm Indication Signal Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LUASs.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LUASs
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LUASs.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Unavailable Second in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LOSSs.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LOSSs
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LOSSs.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 Loss of Signal (LOS) Seconds in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LOFSs.name: ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LOFSs
ncmhdmTCAQtrDs3LOFSs.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 Loss of Frame (LOF) Seconds in 1/4 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCADayEntry.description: An entry in the 24 hour Alert Threshold Table.

ncmhdmTCADayNIDIndex.name: ncmhdmTCADayNIDIndex
ncmhdmTCADayNIDIndex.description: This variable indicates the node id value of the node.

ncmhdmTCADayIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the alert crossing threshold interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value an plcpLineIndex object instance.

ncmhdmTCADayDs3FarEndCCV.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Far End C-bit Code Violation in 24 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCADayDs3FarEndCES.name: ncmhdmTCADayDs3FarEndCES

ncmhdmTCADayDs3CSES.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 C-bit Severely Errored Seconds, in 24 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCADayDs3SEFS.name: ncmhdmTCADayDs3SEFS
ncmhdmTCADayDs3SEFS.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Severely Errored Framing Seconds in 24 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCADayDs3AISS.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Alarm Indication Signal Second in 24 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCADayDs3LUASs.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 layer Unavailable Second in 24 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTCADayDs3LOSSs.description: The performance alert threshold for DS3 Loss of Signal (LOS) Seconds in 24 hour boundary.

ncmhdmTxAlarmIndex.name: ncmhdmTxAlarmIndex
ncmhdmTxAlarmIndex.description: The index value which uniquely identifies the Transmit Alarm interface to which this entry is applicable. The interface identified by a particular value of this index is the same interface as identified by the same value an Dsx3LineIndex object instance.
